name: MM_001_01
description:
“Memory is essentially reconstructive.” Frederic Bartlett.
MM_001_01 is part of the Modular Memories series which plays with composition and scale. Many of these images are smaller fragments of larger pieces and have been framed in a particular way. The framing of something, whether it be visual or mental is a strong concept that occupies a lot of my thinking on the subject of memory. These artworks have been crafted with thoughtful insight and tender loving care. On a technical level, they mix home-brewed generative systems with hand-drawn images using Processing and GANs. 

Special Edition for my top ten collectors.
Size : 2444X 2444 PNG [bitmap image]
2021 | Mark Webster @motiondesign_01
